name: SURV
description: SURV. Is a 2d top-down shooter video game, you will evolve in an open world full of dangers to which you will have to face. You play the survivor of a large-scale epidemic that is slowly decimating people. The spell is cast, the world dies and the only remaining survivors are either eaten by zombies, died of hunger or worse ...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/XP/Vista/7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.2 Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4800+ Memory: 3 Go MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTS 240 / AMD Radeon HD 6570 Storage: 1000 MB available space
